episodes.title: The Five Worst Things about the Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
In this video, I am giving a presentation about the JW's to the Society of Edmonton Atheists. It was given on December 4th, 2018, at the Edmonton Public Library.

I'd like to thank Karen Lumley Kerr, the President of the Society of Edmonton Atheists for inviting me to speak.
And a special thanks to Mark of the Talk Beliefs YouTube Channel for perfecting the video with his top notch editing skills! Please subscribe to his channel, if you haven't already!

I hope you all enjoy the presentation.

episodes.title: London Protest 2018
episodes.description:
Hey guys! So I wanted to make an epic video of London, because I loved the trip so much! This is a bunch of the best snippets from my live streams at the protest, and pictures of the trip. Enjoy! Love to you all!

Created with Movavi Video Editor Plus
https://www.movavi.com/video-editor-plus/?c=veplus14

episodes.title: Are Jehovah's Witnesses a CULT?!
episodes.description:
Hey everyone! I'm back again, finally!

In this video I talk about what factors actually constitute a cult, and why Jehovah's Witnesses are a well known cult amongst cult experts worldwide. I hope it helps. There is, I'm sure, much more information that could be added to this, and in a future video I might expand on it.

Here is a link to my first blog post, have a read!
http://exjw4cultawareness.blogspot.ca/

I'll also post a link written by a Psychologist and cult expert who I only just became aware of through a troll in the comment section, ironically enough:
http://cultexpert.weebly.com/articles-by-dr-mann.html

Please check out this channel for more specific information on certain cults that might interest you:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW4uOCGQxCLHormwGHCs2LQ

Check out this video presentation with cult expert and PhD Alexandra Stein:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nwHlIwCJftg

Check out Steven Hassans channel on YouTube for more interesting videos of former cult members:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxYM6bAC_3l66uCRxFO0QAg

Really great warning signs for how you can identify a cult:
http://www.alexandrastein.com/warning-signs.html\
http://old.freedomofmind.com/Info/BITE/documents/here.pdf
http://old.freedomofmind.com/Info/BITE/bitemodel.php
http://cultexpert.weebly.com/female-cult-leaders.html
